name: Karciarz
overview: Karciarz is a set of four classic card games with all the standard rules implemented: 358 for three players, divided into 18 rounds with the aim to get the highest score. Kierki(Hearts) for three players, divided into 7 rounds with the goal to get the lowest number of penalty points. Wist for two players, where the player must gain more tricks (level) in the selected even number of rounds. 1000 for three players, played with a deck of 24 cards, where the winner is the first collector of a thousand points.
